ygData.subject: You Can Run, But Can You Escape?
ygData.msgSnippet: (Yes, interesting strategy.  That would probably make my life a whole lot easier.  About the pelvis, say I blow up someone s pelvis, that takes care of their

Subject: You Can Run, But Can You Escape?
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

From: KSLawdogg@...

(Yes, interesting strategy.  That would probably make my life a whole lot 
easier.  About the pelvis, say I blow up someone's pelvis, that takes care of 
their legs as well, making it so they are VERY badly damaged and immobile.  
The Mafia only has five members?  Someone told me they had over twenty)

(Also, all shots at Chaos and Minion hit, but they ignore them, and still 
form War Machine)

Serpentor/Punch/Unitron/Sixshot/Ares/Demon Wulf/Flesh
Ripper/Dark Claw/The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot:



Unitron powers up his engines as Stronghold's bolt makes a small dent in his 
armor.  Driving full speed, he fired off another blast from his cannon in 
tank mode at Stronghold.  He saw another gestalt, which didn't phase him all. 
 He also heard the calls for retreat by the enemy.  He would make their 
retreat a harsh one.

---

Demon Wulf watched Gigas stand his ground as he was hit.  Raising his sword, 
Demon Wulf frowned as he saw Sixshot engage Gigas.

---

Sixshot (his type of Transformer is STAG, not name, sorry 'bout that) took 
off, getting cut in the front left paw.  Flapping his wings, he roared 
loudly.  "Ares!  Need a lift?" he yelled as he saw the pesky ants (Chosen 
Ones and Mafia) running to retreat.

Transforming to space fighter mode, a burned Ares (from Grenade's fireballs) 
hopped into Sixshot's cockpit, the cockpit closing and lifting off into the 
air, weapons powering up.

---

Dark Claw ignored Shokaract's grenade as the weapon of destruction exploded 
against the Alliance base's shields, bringing it down a few percents.  Dark 
Claw transformed into his alternate mode.  A large black vehicle that ten 
feet long, had treads and wheels, it seemed to have a cockpit shaped like a 
single claw.

On the sides were laser cannons, and in the back a single missile launcher.  
Roaring to life, Dark Claw began his pursuit of the enemy.  He just hoped 
this mode didn't guzzle to much fuel, or he might have to walk a ways.

---

Flesh Ripper watched Shokaract retreat with Serge.  The Vok warrior 
transformed into his beast mode, a hyena, and slowly padded his way forward.

---

Dark One barrel rolled, the two missiles exploding close to him, covering him 
flames.  The jet landed as he heard the call to retreat, and saw several 
Mafia and Chosen Ones retreat.

"Hiss!  Get over here and get inside!" he yelled, his cockpit opening.

Hiss cursed as Shokaract ran like a coward, not even taking the time to 
return fire.  He would die for his stupidity.  Hiss ran as fast as his legs 
could carry him, hopping into Dark One's cockpit.

---

Nemesis Enforcer laughed, letting himself descend, using his wings to block 
the few shots that would've blown his head apart.  Moving his wings down, 
Nemesis saw the two other bots retreating.  "Cowards..." he spat out, firing 
twenty-five rapid laser blasts at the retreating Sharpedge.

---

Scattershot slowly got up, shaking his.  "What, have to retreat!?" he yelled, 
lifting off into the air full speed.

---

Pyro stopped near Diskus, seeing he was down and left alone.  He saw 
Serpentor slowly approaching.  "YOU!  Finish him off, or put him in a brig!  
I'm going after the retreating attackers!" he yelled, driving as fast as he 
could in his tank mode, firing off a single fire ball at Shokaract, to mess 
with his mind, hopefully.

---

Breakdown transformed to robot mode, watching Doom Ice retreat.  Taking out 
his sonic blast, Breakdown fired a sonic blast that was in the shape of an 
arc at the retreating Doom Ice, Breakdown going to a run, pursuing his 
possibly next victim.

---

Scavenger revved up his motor, going after the retreating forces.

---
